title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Strengthening Mathematical Practical Skills Using Informal Learning Promotion Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can share three or more mathematical problem-solving strategies through collaboration with peer teachers.
Learners can design informal learning activities using learning models in school settings.
Learners can build a system to share and provide feedback on mathematical learning materials using digital tools.
Learners can implement five strategies to create informal learning opportunities within the classroom environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
